header.title: Hey, I'm Enrique Suarez
header.description: Welcome to my little corner, I am a web and software developer , and I would love to join your team and contribute my bit :)

expecience.title: Work Experience
expecience.subtitle: Marketec 360
expecience.description: Internship at a company for 3 months, responsible for creating interactive web apps using NextJS, React, and TailwindCSS with Github and Git for version control.
expecience.proyects_title: Some of the projects in which I have participated in Marketec360

depilacion_laser.title: Depilacion Laser SHR
depilacion_laser.description: Creation of informative website for SHR laser hair removal clinic, with a contact section. Using Nextjs, Typescript and TailwindCSS

movie_finder.title: Movie Finder App (In Development)
movie_finder.description: Creation of a Movie Finder App using react and TailwindCSS for the FrontEnd, NodeJS and MySQL for the BackEnd with a login for users and creation of an API to obtain the Movies info

movie_finder_api.title: Movie Finder REST API (In Development)
movie_finder_api.description: Creation of a REST API using Nodejs, Express and MySQL for the Movie Finder App

by_cambao.title: byCambao Landing Page (In Development)
by_cambao.description: Creation of landing page website for events in Lanzarote, with a contact section. Using Nextjs, Typescript and TailwindCSS

sky_match.title: skyMatch (In Development)
sky_match.description: SkyMatch is a web platform that connects airlines with available aircraft and crew for rental, offering a streamlined solution for covering operational gaps. It provides an intuitive interface, advanced search features, and secure bookings to ensure seamless transactions. Using Nextjs, Typescript and TailwindCSS
